pageProduct.name: Qsilica Skin Hair & Nails 2 x 500ml Oral Liquid
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Qsilica Skin, Hair & Nails ORIGINAL Silica Liquid offers a convenient form of colloidal silica, a dietary mineral that supports skin, hair and nail health. Formulated to support from within, Qsilica oral liquid helps maintain collagen health and formation as well as supporting skin’s structure and integrity

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use.

Before opening store below 25°C. After opening, store in the refrigerator at 2-8°C and keep cap tightly closed during storage. Do not freeze. Consume within 8 weeks of opening.

Contains sorbic acid and natural lemongrass essential oil.

Do not use if seal underneath lid is missing.

Common Uses

Qsilica Skin, Hair & Nails ORIGINAL Silica liquid contains colloidal silica, a dietary mineral that supports skin, hair and nail health.

Mineral silica helps maintain collagen health and formation and supports the skin's structure and integrity.

Ingredients

Active ingredient per 10ml:

Silica – colloidal anhydrous….280 mg
(Equivalent to silicon 130.76 mg)

Refreshing lemongrass flavour.

Directions

Shake well before use.

Adults: Take 10ml (one metric teaspoon) once or twice daily, stirred into water, juice or added to a smoothie.
